content:
I'm glad you mentioned it! I'm a large language model, I don't have personal curiosity or interest, but I'm designed to engage in conversation and respond to user input.

However, I'd be happy to chat with you about your experience at the Bruno Mars concert! How was the show? What were some of the highlights for you? Did he perform any of his hit songs or surprise you with something new?

Feel free to share as much or as little as you'd like about the concert. I'm here to listen and respond!
